posts.post_content:
Al Maul, nice front, not as dark as Dalrymple. Has paper stuck to the back(see scan), which kills the grade, but front is much nicer than an SGC10 $85

  Paypal gift please.

Hecker card sold, so I added these two. They look nicer than the pictures above. My scanner isn't hooked up so the picture quality isn't that good.

If these don't sell by Monday, I'll add better scans.

I'm going to have an SGC 70 Bierbauer for sale next week, so if you're interested in that, drop me a message. No price yet, but here is a crappy scan of it. I bought a different pose of him, so I'm selling the higher grade one once I get the other one in hand.
If still available I'll take the Dalrymple. Thanks, John
Dalrymple card is sold, Maul is on hold. Bierbauer sold
If the Maul sale happens to fall through, let me know.
